items.question: How does content moderation work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes posts and comments in real-time to identify and filter harmful content before it reaches your users. It learns from community feedback to adapt and improve over time.

items.question: Can I customize the moderation guidelines?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can set specific guidelines tailored to your community's values and standards, ensuring relevant content gets through while unwanted material is filtered out.

items.question: How quickly can harmful content be filtered?
items.answer: The AI works in real-time, meaning most harmful content is identified and moderated almost instantaneously, keeping your online environment safe.

items.question: What types of content can be moderated?
items.answer: Our technology is capable of detecting hate speech, spam, explicit content, and other harmful materials across various media, including text, images, and videos.

items.question: Will I receive reports on moderation activities?
items.answer: Yes! You’ll receive regular analytics and reporting on moderation actions taken, allowing for enhanced oversight and strategy adjustments.

items.question: Is this service scalable for large communities?
items.answer: Certainly! Our solutions are designed to scale seamlessly with your growth, efficiently handling increased content volumes without compromising performance.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support including documentation, tutorials, and a dedicated helpdesk to assist with any technical inquiries or challenges.

items.question: Can users appeal moderation decisions?
items.answer: Yes, users can submit appeals through the platform. Each case will be reviewed to ensure fair treatment and transparency in moderation.
